1 /**
  2  * @class
  3  * @namespace Provides template utilities.
  4  * @requires crayon/lib/core.js
  5  * @requires crayon/vendor/ejs/ejs_production.js
  6  */
  7 Crayon.Template = {
  8   /**
  9    * Returns the text using the <tt>t</tt> template with <tt>b</tt> bindings.
 10    */
 11   template: function(t, b){
 12     return new EJS({text: t}).render(b);
 13   }
 14 };
 15 
 16 if( !this.do_not_touch_in_global ){
 17   Crayon.extend(this, Crayon.Template);
 18 }else{
 19   Crayon.extend(Crayon.Template);
 20 }
 21
